PingResponse.description: Represents a standard response structure for API health checks

status.description: Describes the overall status of the API, including system connectivity states. When dependency checks are included, the status identifies whether the API is fully functional (OK), one or more dependencies are down (DEGRADED), or all dependencies are down (OFFLINE).

apiName.description: Asset name of the API returning the response

apiVersion.description: Complete version of the API returning the response; format is major.minor.patch

dependencies.description: Optional list of connections this API is dependent upon

PingStatus.description: Represents a dependency status result for ping responses

name.description: Logical name of the connection (e.g., system name)

status.description: Status of the connection, identifying whether the connection was validated (UP), the connection timed out (DOWN), or the connection attempt failed for some other reason (ERROR)
